mapper.insert: insert into reporter (id, profile_img, category) values(#{id}, #{profile_img}, #{category})
mapper.select: select id, profile_img, category, intro from reporter where id = #{id}
select r.id, u.email, r.category, (select count(*) from report_board where assigned = r.id) as assignedCount from reporter r join users u on r.id = u.id where u.role='reporter'
mapper.update: update users set name = #{name}, nick = #{nick}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email} where id = #{id} and role = 'reporter'
update reporter set profile_img = #{profile_img}, category = #{category}, intro = #{intro} where id = #{id}
